## Results

```{r}
targets::tar_read(df_stats_by_metabolite) %>% 
    dplyr::mutate(MeanSD = glue::glue("{value_mean} ({value_sd})")) %>% 
    dplyr::select(Metabolite = metabolite, `Mean SD` = MeanSD) %>% 
    knitr::kable(caption = "Descriptive statistics of the metabolites")
```
